overview:
Joseph Marinaccio is the founder and current CEO of Slam Content. Slam Content currently publishes 3 magazines, five websites, and four mobile applications and owns Panther Records, a record label based in Hollywood, CA. In March 2011 he was named one of the Top 20 Mobile Technology Executives by VentureBeat. He became the youngest CEO of a NASDAQ listed company in 2011 when Slam Content filed to reserve the trade ticker ‘SLAM’. Business Insider confirmed this after NASDAQ issued a press release. Slam Content has yet to offer its IPO.

Forbes estimated in August 2011 that his personal net worth is approximately $60 million, given his 100% ownership of Slam Content which is one of the five largest digital media companies in the United States.
